# calendar

**Instance Property**

The calendar for formatting the date interval.

## Declaration

```swift
var calendar: Calendar
```

## Specifying Date Interval Format Styles

- **timeZone(_:)**: Modifies the date interval format style to use the specified time zone format.
- **locale**: The locale for formatting the date and time interval components.
- **timeZone**: The time zone for formatting the date interval components.

items.description: Modifies the date interval format style to use the specified time zone format.
